shortDescription: We are engaged in delicate negotiations with a private manufacturer from {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} space, but we have reached an impasse. Our representative has requested a demonstration. "Something dramatic," she said. So we turn to you. Your team will provide on-site assistance to target an abandoned {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} military base near the trade conference. We'll have a WarShip standing by to light it upâ€¦ dramatically.
longDescription: The time-frame on this is tight, since we need the artillery strike to hit while the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} representative has everyone looking in the right direction. And Commander, I wouldn't take any bets on that military base actually being abandoned.

contractObjectiveList.title: Mark the military base for destruction from orbit
contractObjectiveList.description: Attack the Installation and paint the area for a Fire Mission

objectiveList.title: Place Beacon Alpha for Artillery Designation
objectiveList.description: Place Beacon Alpha for Artillery Designation

objectiveList.title: Place Beacon Bravo for Artillery Designation
objectiveList.description: Place Beacon Bravo for Artillery Designation

objectiveList.title: Place Beacon Charlie for Artillery Designation
objectiveList.description: Place Beacon Charlie for Artillery Designation

objectiveList.title: Get Visual Confirmation of Artillery Effect
Defeat Enemy Air Defense
objectiveList.description: Defeat Enemy Air Defense to allow Employer Reinforcements to Land

dialogueContent.words: The client wants to put on a show. We're here to mark the target so that can happen.
Three points make a triangle around the target base. Set up beacons at those points and we can go home.
That base is supposed to be abandoned and empty, but I don't trust that and neither should you.
Timing's important, here. This is a show of force, and if we miss our window, the right people won't be watching.
The target is destroyed. Client's message is signed, sealed, and delivered.
I am putting a stop to this, no way we pull this out of the fire. Abort Mission.
Observer Actual this is Fire Control: Target Locked. Firing for Effect. HE 30 rounds. Danger Close.
Observer Actual this is Fire Control: Shot Over. Splash in 30.
Fire Control this is Observer Actual: Confirmed. Shot, out.
Alpha beacon deployed, Commander. Good work.
Bravo beacon deployed, Commander.
Charlie beacon deployed.
Attention! All {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces, focus fire on the 'Mechs placing beacons for Artillery Strike. Fire at will and bring them down!
All units, close distance on enemy forces. Send a short wave burst near them to disrupt enemy Artillery from locking on! Move quickly!
Keep the pressure on to prevent them a chance to place those beacons!
Fire Control this is Observer Actual: Good effect on target. Targets Destroyed.
Greetings, Commander. Understand that this facility is as important to the {TEAM_TAR_ALLY.FactionDef.Name} as it is to our {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} friends.
Let's see what you got.
*STATIC* -ell, this round is yours. *COUGH* Until next time.
Commander, {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} forces on station. Thanks for clearing those defenses to make way for us.
We'll work in parallel to you and eliminate any opposition we come into contact with.
We're finished, Commander. You're on your own again.
Commander, long range sensors are picking up an enemy bogey. They'll be landing any minute.
I don't have any way to know where they will land, but you can bet they will be close to the base.
Commander, they are depolying vehicles and tanks from their motorpool.
It appears to be subterranian, and hardened. We can't take it out, they will keep comng until the artillery lands. So move quickly.
Commander, our window of oppurtunity for this strike is closing. At least half of our time has expired. You'll need to move quickly if you're to accomplish this.
Commander, my sensors show a large incoming enemy reaction force. Clear out of this AO!
We're holding here for our own reinforcements. Get to your evac point and go! We'll cover you.
CHECK FIRE! CHECK FIRE! FRIENDLIES NOT CLEAR OF IMPACT SITE. OH---
Warning: Incoming artillery fire.
Commander, I've got inbound sensor contacts. Expect enemy reinforcements to drop in at any moment.
Inbound kill team, Boss. We've lingered a bit too long and their quick reinforcements are arriving shortly.
